璙璙璙

璙字的基本解释

璙
liáo
玉名。
古通“镣”，纯美的银子。

璙字的汉语字典释义

[①]［liáo］
［《廣韻》落蕭切，平蕭，來。］
［《廣韻》力小切，上小，來。］
［《廣韻》力弔切，去嘯，來。］
(1)玉名。
(2)同“鐐”。精美的银。

璙字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【玉字部】　璙； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页742第02
【唐韻】洛蕭切【集韻】【韻會】憐蕭切【正韻】連條切，?音聊。【說文】玉也。　又【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?力弔切，音料。又【廣韻】力小切【集韻】朗鳥切，?音繚。義?同。　又與鐐同。【詩·小雅·鞞琫有珌傳】大夫鐐琫而璆珌。【釋文】鐐，本又作璙。

璙字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
璙字的起名意思

指玉名，也指纯美的银子。

Jin
Basic explanation of words
Jin
liáo
Jade name.
Ancient pass "fetters", pure silver.
Jin
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［liáo］
["Guangyun" falls off Xiaoqie, Pingxiao, come. ]
["Guangyun" is a little cut, come on, come on. ]
["Guangyun" forcefully cut, go whistle, come. ]
(1) Jade name.
(2) Same as "fetters". Fine silver.
Jin
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Jade Character Department] 　璙; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 742 No. 02
[Tang Yun] Luo Xiaoqie [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Lian Xiaoqie [Zheng Yun] Cut one by one,? Voice chat. [Said the text] Yu Ye.　[Jiyun] [Rhyme] [Rhyme]? Forced to cut, sound material. Also [Guang Yun] Li Xiaoqie [Jiyun] Long bird cut, sound dazzling. Righteous? Same.　Same as 镣 again. 【Poetry·Xiaoya·Yanlong Youzhuan】The doctor is shackled and 璆珌. 【Explanation】The shackles, the book is made again.
Jin

Name meaning
Refers to the name of jade, and also refers to pure silver.
